text: The 2018 Leinster Senior Football Championship was the 2018 installment of the annual Leinster Senior Football Championship organised by Leinster GAA. Dublin, the defending champions, won their eighth consecutive championship title, defeating Laois in the final. ==Teams== The Leinster championship is contested by 11 of the 12 counties in the Irish province of Leinster.
